text: Motero Ambuye wake adamulandira iye, ndi manja awiri. Ndipo Iye anamukuza bwino, ndipo anamupereka m’manja mwa Zakariya kuti amulere. Nthawi zonse pamene Zakariya adali kulowa ku chipinda kumene iye anali kukhala, anali kumupeza ndi chakudya. Iye adati: “oh Maria! Kodi chakudya ichi chili kuchokera kuti?” Iye adati: “Chili kuchokera kwa Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu amapereka chakudya mopanda malire, kwa aliyense amene wamufuna.”
